sentences.sContent: The cruelest insult, on the contrary, which can be offered to the unfortunate, is to appear to make light of their calamities.
sentences.sContent_eng: The cruelest insult, on the contrary, which can be offered to the unfortunate, is to appear to make light of their calamities.
sentences.sCn: 反过来说，对不幸者最大的侮辱似乎是不幸的境遇遭到轻视。
